# atemplatesr

This package will contains teaching and research templates for personal use.

## Installation

You can install atemplatesr from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("AnestisTouloumis/atemplatesr")
```
